name: Hentai
description:
Hentai is a girl you play in a big beautiful world including 21 rooms with different paths.
Try to collect all the 22 mushrooms on your journey for something special..

The game uses different mechanics, double jump by pressing z twice.
Dodge all kind of enemies, saws, droppers, floating slimes and water!

The game has 7 checkpoints, every path you take you can get back to in this open map.

Steam controller and keyboard & mouse are supported.

Any future updates will be free! suggestions are always welcome on the forums.
